add_key.desc: add key to meta/files of different entries

clone_server_repo.desc: download a whole repository from the server

preload_html_for_lists.desc: preload HTMLs for lists of components

prepare_entry_template.desc: select template for a given module

process_all_files_recursively.desc: process all files recursively using some action

replace_strings_in_file.desc: replace multiple strings in a given file

select_string.desc: given a list of strings, pick one by index OR substring match

transfer.desc: download or upload a bunch of CK entries between a local and a remote repo
